original_text: Solomon left all these things unweighed, because there were so many; the weight of the bronze was not determined.
korean_text: 기구가 심히 많으므로 솔로몬이 다 달아보지 아니하고 두었으니 그 놋 무게를 능히 측량할 수 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Solomon left all these things unweighed
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 이 모든 것들을 달지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: the weight of the bronze was not determined
